name: Bouffalant
author: Tonji Matsuno
flavor_text: These Pokémon can crush a car with no more than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on their heads hold higher positions within the herd.

abilities.name: Curly Wall
abilities.effect: As long as you have at least 1 other Bouffalant in play, all of your Basic {C} Pokémon take 60 less damage from attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). The effect of Curly Wall doesn’t stack.

attacks.name: Boundless Power
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t attack.
